description: Deals damage to attacking creature when hit
Attacks random opposing slot when played
Weakens attacking creature when hit (reduces ATK)
Cannot be blocked by summons without flying
Every same-type ally kill raises this creature's HP by 2
Cannot be impacted by negative status effects
When ally is killed gain +1 ATK
Excess damage to summons overflows to opponent
Opposing cards take damage over time
Every other tribal type on the field raises this creature's HP by 1
Damage done to opponent heals you for the damage dealt
